Duties  and Responsibility  
 
Erection and Installation at Substation ( Acting Site Manager)  
    Develop Overall Time schedule  to determine  most effective means  of accomplishing  
objectives a nd to condu ct  and coordinate  all related  activities. 
  Moni toring progress  / achievements   and taking necess ary  measures  to ensure  
timely Project completion  & consumer  satisfaction. 
 Review Project status Report  and modi fy the schedule as necess ary. 
 Maintain Close contact with Client in all project  matters  to keep project on track. 
 Coordinates  with the Proje ct Manager  on daily  basis  to assure  a smooth  flow of all       
project  related  operations  and activities . 
 Execution of the electro  mechani cal work  on time and within  budget.  
 Coordinate with all electrical  and mechanic al  site activities. 
 Planning and scheduling  short  and long term site activities  utilizing the construction  
schedul e. 
 Mon itoring progress  and assuring  that all schedule  milestones  are achieved. 
 Assuring  compliance  with all company  administra tive   procedure s 
 Monitoring  constru ction  costs  and acting to assure  that the project  stays in budg et. Erection and Installation at Substation  ( Site Engineer)  
 Erection and Installation of EOT Crane -5 Ton .

 Erection and Installation of HV cable sealing End , Surge Arresster for OHTL Line  
 Erection and Installation of Protection & Control Panels.  
 Erection and Installation of Power Transformer s (110/13.8k V &132/13.8/33kV ).

Quality Assurance and Quality Control  (QA/QC Engineer)  
 Review  Project Technical Specification to understand the complete Scope of Work  
 Inspection of Materials /Equipment’s  with Client as per SEC Standards and Specification (RMI) . 
 Inspection for Installation with Client as per SEC Standards and Specification (RFI) . 
 Working parallel with Site Engineer in Erection and Installation work to achieve the SEC 
standards and Specification . 
 Quality Inspection of Materials as per the actual app roved design with client(NG -SA)  
 Finalizing Ma terials Estimation & Major Equip ment's with Procurement Department in line 
with Quality Assurance and Quality Control Requirements.  
 Coordination with FAT Witness and Third Party inspection of Equipment's involv ed.  
 Preparation of BOQ as per site requirements . 
 Inventory Report Analysis . 
 Preparation of Weekly Report .
